title: An answer to the late King James's declaration to all his pretended subjects in the kingdom of England, dated at Dublin-castle, May 8, 1689 ordered by a vote of the Right Honourable the House of Commons, to be burnt by the common-hangman.
author: Welwood, James, 1652-1727.
notes: Attributed to Welwood by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
